text: Hey <@UG7S8J18D> I believe the reason is that membership templates are not allowed in the Marketplace is because they are only available in CMS Enterprise. However, they are a part of the boilerplate so that developers have a starting point if they're building them for other purposes.

Thank you for explaining that. Someone contacted me looking for a marketplace theme with this functionality and I told him it doesn't exist and to build custom so I guess I was right. Thanks for replying here.
No problem! Hope all is well.
